txt.en: 'Where is it that you come from?'
Register your heritage with the notary.
'Ah... Dale.\n\n'You come from the Dale-lands in the north-east of Middle-earth, beneath the Lonely Mountain, where Bard the Bowman slew the dragon Smaug and fought in the Battle of Five Armies.'
Speak with Bonnie Milkweed, the notary
Bonnie Milkweed can be found in the Bree-town Hall.
